byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and ERIC LICHTBLAU

lead_paragraph: It is unusual for a president to direct the Justice Department to open a criminal investigation into his opponents, or to talk publicly about doing so.
snippet: It is unusual for a president to direct the Justice Department to open a criminal investigation into his opponents, or to talk publicly about doing so....

headline.main: Trump Directs Justice Department to Investigate ‘Criminal Leaks’
headline.print_headline: Trump Asks Justice Dept. to Investigate Damaging ‘Criminal Leaks’
